00033 void SubBarManagement::xSetup()
00034 {
00035    //DAVID Setup Background;
00036    pixBackground.load("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/SubBarBackground.png");
00037    setBackgroundPixmap(pixBackground);
00038    
00039    //DAVID init state
00040    MMtype=em_mmmusic;
00041    
00042    //Btn Graphic
00043    BtnGraphic[0]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/Bar-MM-Btn-Floder.png");
00044    BtnGraphic[1]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/Bar-MM-Btn-Floder-Active.png");
00045    BtnGraphic[2]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/Bar-MM-Btn-Paste.png");
00046    BtnGraphic[3]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/Bar-MM-Btn-Paste-Active.png");
00047    BtnGraphic[4]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/Bar-MM-Btn-Cut.png");
00048    BtnGraphic[5]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/Bar-MM-Btn-Cut-Active.png");
00049    BtnGraphic[6]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/Bar-MM-Btn-Delete.png");
00050    BtnGraphic[7]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/Bar-MM-Btn-Delete-Active.png");
00051    BtnGraphic[8]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/Bar-MM-Btn-Music.png");
00052    BtnGraphic[9]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/Bar-MM-Btn-Music-Active.png");
00053    BtnGraphic[10]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/Bar-MM-Btn-Image.png");
00054    BtnGraphic[11]=new QPixmap("/root/kde_application/hdass08/skin/Bar-MM-Btn-Image-Active.png");
00055    
00056    SubBtnMM_Floder=new SkinButton(this);
00057    SubBtnMM_Paste=new SkinButton(this);
00058    SubBtnMM_Cut=new SkinButton(this);
00059    SubBtnMM_Delete=new SkinButton(this);
00060    SubBtnMM_MusicNImage=new SkinButton(this);
00061    
00062    SubBtnMM_Floder->setPixmaps(BtnGraphic[0],BtnGraphic[1]);
00063    SubBtnMM_Floder->setGeometry(197,0,60,80);
00064    SubBtnMM_Floder->show();
00065    
00066    SubBtnMM_Paste->setPixmaps(BtnGraphic[2],BtnGraphic[3]);
00067    SubBtnMM_Paste->setGeometry(263,0,60,80);
00068    SubBtnMM_Paste->show();
00069    
00070    SubBtnMM_Cut->setPixmaps(BtnGraphic[4],BtnGraphic[5]);
00071    SubBtnMM_Cut->setGeometry(329,0,60,80);
00072    SubBtnMM_Cut->show();
00073    
00074    SubBtnMM_Delete->setPixmaps(BtnGraphic[6],BtnGraphic[7]);
00075    SubBtnMM_Delete->setGeometry(391,0,60,80);
00076    SubBtnMM_Delete->show();
00077    
00078    SubBtnMM_MusicNImage->setPixmaps(BtnGraphic[8],BtnGraphic[9]);
00079    SubBtnMM_MusicNImage->setGeometry(457,0,80,80);
00080    SubBtnMM_MusicNImage->show();
00081    
00082    //DAVID Connect buttons
00083    QObject::connect(SubBtnMM_MusicNImage,SIGNAL(pressed()),this,SLOT(slotChangeBtnImage()));
00084    QObject::connect(SubBtnMM_Floder,SIGNAL(pressed()),this,SLOT(slotBtnMkFloder()));
00085    QObject::connect(SubBtnMM_Paste,SIGNAL(pressed()),this,SLOT(slotBtnPaste()));
00086    QObject::connect(SubBtnMM_Cut,SIGNAL(pressed()),this,SLOT(slotBtnCut()));
00087    QObject::connect(SubBtnMM_Delete ,SIGNAL(pressed()),this,SLOT(slotBtnDelete()));
00088 }
00089 void  SubBarManagement::slotChangeBtnImage()
00090 {
00091    if(MMtype==em_mmmusic)
00092    {
00093       MMtype=em_mmimage;
00094       SubBtnMM_MusicNImage->setPixmaps(BtnGraphic[10],BtnGraphic[11]);
00095       emit signalManagementModeChange(0);
00096    }
00097    else
00098    {
00099      MMtype=em_mmmusic;
00100      SubBtnMM_MusicNImage->setPixmaps(BtnGraphic[8],BtnGraphic[9]);
00101      emit signalManagementModeChange(1);
00102    }
00103 }
00104 
00105 void SubBarManagement::slotBtnMkFloder()
00106 {
00107   emit signalMkdir();
00108 }

00110 void SubBarManagement::slotBtnPaste()
00111 {
00112   emit singalPasteFUNC_MEDIAM();
00113 }

00115 void SubBarManagement::slotBtnCut()
00116 {
00117   emit signalCutFUNC_MEDIAM();
00118 }

00120 void SubBarManagement::slotBtnDelete()
00121 {
00122   emit signalDeleteItem();
00123 }
